title: Pip and the Moon Rabbit
description:
Can a dog and a strange rabbit from the moon become friends? Have a listen to Kim telling this story from Tibet and find out.

If you'd like to support the show or subscribe for ad-free episodes you can find us on our Ko-fi page - HERE
